get.description: Get a list of subscription status definitions from the account.

parameters.name: businessUnitId
parameters.description: If you have the [business unit add-on](https://developers.hubspot.com/beta-docs/guides/api/settings/business-units-api), include this parameter to filter results by business unit ID. The default Account business unit will always use `0`.

parameters.name: includeTranslations
parameters.description: Set to `true` to return subscription translations associated with each definition.

post.description: Batch retrieve subscription statuses for a set of contacts.

parameters.name: channel
parameters.description: The channel type for the subscription type. Currently, the only supported channel type is `EMAIL`.

parameters.name: businessUnitId
parameters.description: If you have the [business unit add-on](https://developers.hubspot.com/beta-docs/guides/api/settings/business-units-api), include this parameter to filter results by business unit ID. The default Account business unit will always use `0`.

post.summary: Batch unsubscribe contacts from all subscriptions
post.description: Unsubscribe a set of contacts from all email subscriptions.

parameters.name: channel
parameters.description: The channel type for the subscription type. Currently, the only supported channel type is `EMAIL`.

parameters.name: businessUnitId
parameters.description: If you have the [business unit add-on](https://developers.hubspot.com/beta-docs/guides/api/settings/business-units-api), include this parameter to filter results by business unit ID. The default Account business unit will always use `0`.

parameters.name: verbose
parameters.description: Set to `true` to include the details of the updated subscription statuses in the response. Not including this parameter will result in an empty response.

post.summary: Batch retrieve contacts who have opted out of all communications
post.description: Checks whether a set of contacts have opted out of all communications.

parameters.name: channel
parameters.description: The channel type for the subscription type. Currently, the only supported channel type is `EMAIL`.

parameters.name: businessUnitId
parameters.description: If you have the [business unit add-on](https://developers.hubspot.com/beta-docs/guides/api/settings/business-units-api), include this parameter to filter results by business unit ID. The default Account business unit will always use `0`.

post.description: Update the subscription status for a set of contacts.

get.summary: Get subscription preferences for a specific contact
get.description: Retrieve a contact's current email subscription preferences.

parameters.name: subscriberIdString
parameters.description: The contact's email address.

parameters.name: channel
parameters.description: The channel type for the subscription type. Currently, the only supported channel type is `EMAIL`.

parameters.name: businessUnitId
parameters.description: If you have the [business unit add-on](https://developers.hubspot.com/beta-docs/guides/api/settings/business-units-api), include this parameter to filter results by business unit ID. The default Account business unit will always use `0`.

post.description: Set the subscription status of a specific contact.

parameters.name: subscriberIdString
parameters.description: The contact's email address.

get.description: Check whether a contact has unsubscribed from all email subscriptions. If a contact has not opted out of all communications, the response `results` array will be empty.

parameters.name: subscriberIdString
parameters.description: The contact's email address.

parameters.name: channel
parameters.description: The channel type for the subscription type. Currently, the only supported channel type is `EMAIL`.

parameters.name: businessUnitId
parameters.description: If you have the [business unit add-on](https://developers.hubspot.com/beta-docs/guides/api/settings/business-units-api), include this parameter to filter results by business unit ID. The default Account business unit will always use `0`.

parameters.name: verbose
parameters.description: Set to `true` to include the details of the updated subscription statuses in the response. Not including this parameter will result in an empty response.

post.summary: Unsubscribe a contact from all subscriptions
post.description: Unsubscribe a contact from all email subscriptions.

parameters.name: subscriberIdString
parameters.description: The contact's email address.

parameters.name: channel
parameters.description: The channel type for the subscription type. Currently, the only supported channel type is `EMAIL`.

parameters.name: businessUnitId
parameters.description: If you have the [business unit add-on](https://developers.hubspot.com/beta-docs/guides/api/settings/business-units-api), include this parameter to filter results by business unit ID. The default Account business unit will always use `0`.

parameters.name: verbose
parameters.description: Set to `true` to include the details of the updated subscription statuses in the response. Not including this parameter will result in an empty response.

completedAt.description: The date and time when the operation was completed.

errors.description: An array of error objects detailing any issues encountered during the operation.
